mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time, count(1) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount,SUM(d.pay_off) winlose, SUM(d.valid_amount) validamount FROM ds_fenfen_lotto d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT IFNULL(t.id,52000) as game_type, IFNULL(t.game_name,'ds分分彩') game_name, COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount, SUM(d.pay_off) winlose, SUM(d.valid_amount) validamount FROM ds_fenfen_lotto d LEFT JOIN ds_game_type t ON d.lotto_type = t.out_game_code AND t.fk_live_id=12 and t.parent_id = 52
GROUP BY d.lotto_type
select count(*) as bet_count,sum(bet_amount) as betamount,sum(valid_amount) as validamount,sum(pay_off) as winlose from ds_fenfen_lotto
mapper.sql: id, from_lotto, trans_id, billno, username, site_id, currency, lotto_name, lotto_type, qishu, bet_amount, valid_amount, pay_off, item, bet_time, play_info, odds, state, win_loss_type, ip, flag, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from ds_fenfen_lotto
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from ds_fenfen_lotto
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ds_fenfen_lotto (from_lotto, trans_id, billno, username, site_id, currency, lotto_name, lotto_type, qishu, bet_amount, valid_amount, pay_off, item, bet_time, play_info, odds, state, win_loss_type, ip, flag, create_time, update_time, play) values (#{fromLotto,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lottoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lottoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qishu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{betAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{validAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payOff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{betTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{playInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{winLossType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{play,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
